```{r}
#Question 2

tree_dat%>%
  filter(standID == 1) %>%
```

```{r}
#Question 3

tree_dat %>%
  filter (species %in% c("ABBA", "PIST"))%>%
  count(species)

```

```{r}
#Question 4

last_year <- max(tree_dat$year, na.rm =TRUE)

tree_dat%>%
  filter(year == last_year, age > 200) %>%
  tally ()
```
